line_1: And silent hear the creaking Rails;
line_2: With Pleasure view the frothing Pails,

line_1: I cannot bear those nasty rails,
And every tongue in concert rails:
line_2: O'er all reserve their spleen prevails,

line_1: And no harsh Mistress domineers, or rails?
line_2: Where Shepherds 'tend their Flocks, and Maids their Pails,
